subject: Verb SER
intro: The big problem that students have with the verb TO BE is that in Spanish it can be translated in several different ways. Today you will learn one, the verb SER.
final: Well done! Now, it’s time to practice!
title: When to use SER?

steps.explanation: In the same way that you cannot say in English 'I drink a sandwich', in Spanish you must also use the correct verb for what you want to say. So you ALWAYS have to use the verb SER to express the following ideas:
To talk about the nationality/origin of something/someone.
To talk about job, occupation and avocation.
examples: Nosotros somos voluntarios en una fundación
keys: We don't use un/una before the adjective

steps.explanation: To talk about relationships, whether you think are permanent or not.
examples: La empresa es socia de otra compañía

steps.explanation: To talk about who owns what.
examples: El coche es de mi hermano

steps.explanation: To talk about date and time.
examples: Son las seis de la tarde
El cumpleaños es el 5 de mayo

steps.explanation: To talk about location of events.
examples: La fiesta es en mi casa
La reunión es en el restaurante
El concierto es en el parque
